amendment.description: An amendment numbered 47 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to require the Army Corps of Engineers to include in future workplans, to the maximum extent practicable, any project or facility for disposition for which the Corps has a final report from the Director of Civil Works.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Schrader.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
